main event: A bright light with a greenish glow was observed maneuvering in a straight path with a bluish glow in Rapid City, South Dakota.
interesting points: The object was observed by two local residents at approximately 2225L on July 8, 1964.
The object was visible for approximately 10 minutes.
The witness described the object as a bright light with a greenish glow that maneuvered in a straight path with a bluish glow.
The report was forwarded to Project Blue Book by Lt. Scotte, the Base Intelligence Officer at LRAFB.
The conclusion in the report states that the object was a 'Possible astronomical object (Planet Venus)'.
sighted object: bright light with a greenish glow
